name: bootstrap-icons

scripts.docs-purge: npm run docs-build && purgecss --css docs/static/assets/css/bootstrap.min.css --content "_site/**/*.html" --output docs/static/assets/css/
scripts.icons: node build/build-svgs.js && npm run icons-sprite && npm run icons-font
scripts.icons-zip: cross-env-shell "shx rm -rf bootstrap-icons-$npm_package_version && shx cp -r icons/ bootstrap-icons-$npm_package_version && shx cp bootstrap-icons.svg bootstrap-icons-$npm_package_version && shx cp -r font/ bootstrap-icons-$npm_package_version && zip -r9 bootstrap-icons-$npm_package_version.zip bootstrap-icons-$npm_package_version && shx rm -rf bootstrap-icons-$npm_package_version"
scripts.netlify: cross-env-shell HUGO_BASEURL=$DEPLOY_PRIME_URL npm-run-all icons docs-purge docs-build
